product.description: Built for lightweight performance with anatomical engineering and components for women, the Myka is the best-performing recreational mountain bike at a value everyone can appreciate. Myka Elite Disc 29er component highlights include an 80mm-travel SR Suntour fork, Tektro hydraulic disc brakes and Specialized Fast Trak Sport tyres.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Recreational XC 29er Geometry, low standover, optimised stack and reach for a confident and lightweight ride
80mm smooth-travel SR Suntour fork with preload adjustment and custom women's spring weights delivers size-appropriate tunability for varying terrain
SR Suntour 9-speed crankset with Shimano Alivio 9-speed rear derailleur for crisp shifting
Tektro hydraulic disc brakes with women's shorter reach levers assure precise braking and durability
Women's Body Geometry Riva Plus saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

skus.sku: 81514-4202 MYKA HT ELITE DISC 29 BLK/HYP GRN S
81514-4302 MYKA HT ELITE DISC 29 WHT/CHAR/FLORED S

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized Myka A1 Premium Aluminium, Women's Recreational XC 29er Geometry and tubesets, fully butted, double ORE downtube, externally relieved headtube, forged dropouts w/ replaceable alloy hanger
specs.fork: FORK SR Suntour XCM-LO 29", hydraulic damping w/ lockout, custom women's coil/MCU spring, 1-1/8" steel steerer, alloy disc only post-mount lower, 30mm Hi-Ten stanchion, preload adj., 80mm travel
specs.stem: STEM Specialized 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt clamp, 6-degree rise, 31.8mm
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized flat bar, double-butted 6061 alloy, 660mm wide, 10-degree backsweep, 4-degree upsweep, 31.8mm
specs.grips: GRIPS Specialized Women's Myka, dual-density, Kraton
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Tektro HD-M330, hydraulic disc, dual piston, tooled reach adj., TR-4 Light Wave rotor, 160mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Tektro HD-M330, hydraulic disc, dual piston, tooled reach adj., TR-4 Light Wave rotor, 160mm rotor
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Tektro HD-M330, hydraulic lever, women's shorter reach, tooled reach adj.
specs.front_derailleur: FRONT DERAILLEUR Shimano Acera, 9-speed, 34.9mm clamp, high-mount, bottom-swing
specs.rear_derailleur: REAR DERAILLEUR Shimano Alivio, 9-speed, SGS cage
specs.shift_levers: SHIFT LEVERS Shimano Acera, 9-speed Rapidfire Plus, w/ optical display
specs.crankset: CRANKSET SR Suntour XCR, 9-speed, Octalink, replaceable rings
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET Shimano, Octalink spline, cartridge bearings, 73mm shell
specs.rims: RIMS Stout Disc 29", alloy double-wall, 26mm, pin joint, 36h
specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, QR, 36h
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 36h
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Fast Trak Sport, 29x2.0", wire bead, 60TPI
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Fast Trak Sport, 29x2.0", wire bead, 60TPI
specs.saddle: SADDLE Specialized Body Geometry Riva Plus Women's, steel rails, 155mm
specs.seat_binder: SEAT BINDER Alloy, 34.9mm, QR, nylon washer, anti-corrosion bolt

product.description: Built for lightweight performance with anatomical engineering and components for women, the Myka is the best-performing recreational mountain bike at a value everyone can appreciate. Myka Sport Disc component highlights include an 80mm-travel SR Suntour fork, Tektro disc brakes and Shimano Altus trigger shifters.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Recreational XC 29er Geometry and low standover for a confident and lightweight ride
80mm smooth-travel SR Suntour fork with preload adjustment, lockout, and custom women's spring weights delivers size-appropriate tunability for varying terrain
Reliable SR Suntour XCT crankset with chainguard for added protection; Shimano Acera rear derailleur with 8-speed Sunrace cassette for crisp shifting
Tektro hydraulic disc brakes with women's levers assure precise and worry-free braking
Women's Body Geometry Riva Plus saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

product.description: Built for lightweight efficiency with anatomical engineering and components for women, the Myka is the best-performing recreational mountain bike at a value everyone can appreciate. Myka component highlights include an 80mm-travel SR Suntour fork and Shimano trigger shifters.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium step-through frame with Women's Recreational XC Geometry and low entry for a confident and lightweight ride
75mm smooth-travel SR Suntour fork with preload adjustment and custom women's spring weights delivers size-appropriate tunability for varying terrain
Specialized Fast Trak Sport tyres use a reduced knob height for lower rolling resistance, but have plenty of grip for confidence on the trail
Reliable triple crankset with chainguard for added protection; Shimano Altus 7-speed rear derailleur for crisp shifting
Women's Body Geometry Riva Plus saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort
